Dble post, but anybody else know BB doujins without femdom/bullying focus?

It's not NTR for two reasons, there's absolutely no reference to the Master, so you can presume this is just how it is in this story, and the bigger thing is that it's literally a doujin in the story.....Pg. 11 says it, and Pg. 27 shows Gudao showing the doujin to BB, who immediately rejects it since R-18 Doujins aren't allowed in Serva*Fes. It's literally all fictional in the scope of the story.

The submissive side she shows here is more what I'd expect from her with Hakuno than Robin, but it seems like it was just a ploy to get mana anyway.
